src_original: punar aparam āyuṣmantas tathāgato 'tītānāgatapratyutpannāni karmadharmasamādānāni [Tib.307b] sthānato hetuto vastuto vipākataś ca yathābhūtaṃ  yāvad vipākataś ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
tgt_original: 復次如來以無分別一切智智，如實了知過去未來現在諸業、業攝取因善與不善無量行相，無著無礙。

src_original: punar aparam āyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ indriyaparāparatāṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.  yad āyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ pūrvavat.
tgt_original: 復次如來以無上上一切智智，如實了知種種勝解、無量勝解、各各勝解所有分別及妄分別。

src_original: yena baleneti pūrvavat.  punar aparam āyuṣmantas tathāgato nānāvimuktikaṃ lokam anekavimuktikam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.  yad āyuṣmaṃtas tathāgataḥ pūrvavat.
tgt_original: 復次如來能如實知無量界、種種界、無量緣、種種緣世間住處。

src_original: yena baleneti pūrvavat.  punar aparam āyuṣmaṃtas tathāgto nānādhātukaṃ anekadhātukam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.  yad āyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ [Tib.308a] pūrvavat.
tgt_original: 復次如來能如實知若因若緣知見趣道。
